comment: This is the worst professor. He is very old school and made us do presentations with transparencies instead of teaching us how to make power point. I did not learn anything from this class.
Great teacher with extremelly values!!
He only gives girls A's. If you're a girl, take him. If you're an ugly girl or a guy, don't.
very old... hopefully he'll retire soon because he's one of the worst teachers i've ever had. no one  deserves to have him.

This prof frequently spent entire class periods lecturing about completely off-topic topics.  He once spent twenty minutes of class yelling at every student that had given a speech that day, calling them "terrible" and "even worse than the others".  If he doesn't like your topic, you're not going to do well. Do NOT talk about anything tech related

Terrible grading method. Sometimes he gave letter grades other times he gave numbers. told us at the beginning that 1/3 of the class would get an A, next 1/3 a B, and so on. He did not do that, no one got an A.

If you get this teacher, drop him. He is beyond retirement age and it is impossible to make an A on a speech. ANY speech you do, no matter how hard you work on it, will not please him. He is very liberal and forces his opinions on you. If you want an A, don't take him!
I would not recommend him. That is the only class I got a B. He is confusing.

He is a tough teacher and his explanations of the assignments are unclear. He will call you out in front of everybody and make you feel bad about simple mistakes. But after his class you will be more confident about public speaking because you have heard a lot of criticism.

This guy has been teaching this subject for a very long time and he knows what he is talking about.He is old fashioned, but just ignore that and sit back to listen to his stories.  3 graded speeches during the course, no tests, no book to buy (he puts it all on electronic reserve for you)  Overall, good teacher who is nearing retirement soon.

I was surprised when I got an "A".  He was often times TERRIBLE at explaining assignments.  Just before the last day of class, we realized that all of our final papers differed in some way from one another.  It wasn't out fault; nobody was sure what he wanted.  Other than that, I personally have a bias against public speaking, but practice helps!

SCROOGE!!! He is very unclear about what he wants in your outline of your speeches. When giving a speech, your topic is never a good topic, and there is always something wrong with your speech, not matter what. I got a B in the class which was very suprising. He is also very hard to talk to, being a speech teacher, that should be an easy thing to d

I took this class as an incoming freshman and let me tell you it was quite an easy A. Just follow the syllabus and you will make a good grade. Prof. Haley grades you, in my opinion, on how well you follow his directions and as long as you really try, you will get at least a B. Overall easy class and no final!
Good class to prepare you for the rest of college.  He tells some pretty good stories as well.

This professor is probably not the best teacher to take, but if you can handle some criticism from him in front of the class and understand nobody in the class cares what he thinks of your speech take him, my speeches got Cs and Ds and an A or two thrown in (his grading scale is completely worthless) and I somehow managed a B in the class.

Truthfully this class is very easy. Got a B's without trying. He is very forgetful and his examples contradict what he wants his class to do. He is very easy...just try your best to do what he wants and you should get a B

Completely forgetful - like in a not sure how many speeches we had given by the end of the semester (we'd spoken 4 times each and he said we'd only done 1 speech)?? Very unclear on expectations on grading.  Don't give consertive speech or anything digital/computer related.  Also - he doesn't let you use power point - only transparencies?!
No Comments

Do not take this professor unless you have to, it wasnt a very difficult class, he is just extremely unfair when it comes to grading.  He told us our speeches would be graded on our speech delivery abilities, not the material being delivered...yet he took off points because he did not agree with what i was speaking about.  Avoid this old man
Public Speech was not one of my favorite subjects, and Prof. Haley made it even worse.

I admittedly am not a very good public speaker, and Dr. Haley is a very hard professor. That being said he's fair. He gives clear and helpful directions for preparation, and those that follow will have nothing to worry about. Dr. Haley also criticizes the classes speeches openly, but all criticizim has good intentions.

this guy isnt that hard just make sure you practice you speeches before delivering them. He does forget very easil especially after he had an incident in march of 05 where he got hit with a golf ball in the head. Try to avoid this guy at all costs.
No Comments
Perhaps the worst professor available. Can't please him and his lectures are completely boring. Definitely avoid him!

Impossible to please teacher. It is a core class so you have to take it. This man will make you wanna pull your hair out. just put in a good amount of effort on speeches and you will get a b in the class. Very liberal so dont do a speech with a conservative bias. Good Luck
No Comments

Teacher is approx. 70-75 years old and forgets what he says all the time. The class itself should be easy, but he makes it a living hell.  Is extremely unclear about what he wants for his speeches.  If he does not like your speech, he will criticize you, sometimes for at least 10 minutes in front of the entire class.  Try to avoid this guy

This guy is a real winner. He plays favorites, and jocks are his buddies! He shows a great deal of bias based on appearance (and I do NOT mean whether or not a speaker is dressed appropriately) and whether or not he agrees with the speaker's personal opinions. Don't expect to learn anything about public speaking. Do expect verbal abuse.
No Comments

Class sounds very hard by the lectures, but when speeches come around he will usually give you a B even if you do absolutely nothing he says. Very fair with grades, but he has a very bad memory and can't remember anything he says from previously classes.

Prof has no clue on what is going on. If he does not like your speech, will nit pick small flaws that others made.  Very forgetful and not organized.  One student can make flaws he went over in class and not get yelled at but another makes the same mistake and get yelled at and lower grade.

You can get an easy A or B by just doing the assignments but you will still HATE this class.  Ive seen people get yelled at for the entire period for a speech he didnt like. He is extremely unclear and forgetful. I would recommend it but don't expect to like it.

I didn't find the class particularly hard, but hated it all the same. He frequently spends class time YELLING at people for speeches he disliked. He had no real criteria for the speeches meaning his grades are mostly random.  Jocks and people who love baseball are always successful with him.

why would anyone want to take speech? i made an A, from sheer luck i suppose. Expect a B, thats what most people get. if you do decide to take heres some advise: -prior to your presentation, get your outline proofed by him -ask him for topics he likes -he favors baseball players.. that benchowd

The class was easy for me, but I think that he may play favorites. Other people had their speeches picked apart after they gave them, which he said was done in order to prevent people from making the same mistakes that those people made.
Not Good teacher.  I dont think he understands the English language that well, because he wasn't making any sense.  Still got an 'A'.

This man is rutheless! I warn you i have seen people get chewed out infront of the class for an entire 40+minuets!!! He's an interesting individual at heart although his unclarity is soo confusing it fustrates everyone.
Haley's speech class is very easy to pass, he's just not clear on what he wants you to do. and please BEWARE: if your speech sucks, Haley will call you out on it in front of the class.
He isn't very clear in what he wants you to do but he is very gracious with grades. i prepared for a speech the night before and got a B+. Imagine if I really worked at it.
Very hard man. He doesn't explain the assignment clearly. He just tell you that your next speech is due on so and so date. Wouldn't recommend him !!

Terrible instructor.  He forgets from class meeting to class meeting what he has assigned and what has been covered.  He will tell you that his way is the only correct way to do things.  Hates anyone who is not a outspoken liberal democrat.
No Comments
